name: Howmet Aerospace Inc.
description: Howmet Aerospace Inc. is a leading global provider of advanced engineered solutions for the aerospace and transportation industries. Formed in 2016 as a spin-off from Arconic Inc., Howmet specializes in the manufacturing and distribution of aerospace components and systems, particularly in the areas of titanium and aluminum castings, as well as engineered fasteners and other critical aerospace components. The company operates with a strong commitment to innovation and sustainability, focusing on enhancing performance and safety in aviation while minimizing environmental impact. Howmet’s extensive product portfolio includes turbine engine components, airframe structures, and fastening systems, which are essential for modern aircraft and aerospace systems. With a global footprint, Howmet serves a diverse customer base that includes major aircraft manufacturers and military organizations. The company is dedicated to advancing technology and engineering excellence, investing heavily in research and development to meet the evolving needs of the aerospace sector. Howmet Aerospace is also committed to fostering a culture of safety and integrity, driven by its mission to deliver high-quality solutions while promoting sustainable practices in the aviation industry.
